solution.text:
Let the amount that Mohammad donated be x
Let the amount that Arjun donated be y
The statement tells us they both collectively donated Rs._{{10*k}}_
Therefore, we can know that x and y together add up to Rs._{{10*k}}_
\(\implies\) x + y = _{{k*10}}_ OR y = _{{k*10}}_ - x

content.text: Mohammad and Arjun together contributed Rs._{{10*k}}_ towards the National Relief Fund to help drought victims in Maharashtra. (You may denote their contributions as x and y respectively)
